caption.p: (a) Schematic illustration showing the interfacial behavior of CNC/LAE complexes at the sunflower oil/water interface. Adapted from ref ( 73). Copyright 2018 American Chemical Society. (b) Structuring of a liquid jet in tubular shapes through the rapid assembly of CNC/amine end-functionalized polystyrene nanoparticle-surfactants at the toluene/water interface. Adapted with permission from ref ( 74). Copyright 2017 Wiley-VCH.
